select cc.class_course_id,sc.class_id,cc.course_id,cc.course_year,cc.type,scc.course_name,sc.class_name from school_class as sc inner join class_course as cc on cc.class_id = sc.class_id inner join school_course as scc on scc.course_id = cc.course_id where 1=1
and scc.course_name like concat('%',#{para.courseName},'%')
and sc.class_id =#{para.classId}
order by cc.course_year desc
